pr_title: Show reason for not rated games

timeline.bodyText: This will not translate the validity reasons, so it's not a proper i18n solution.
timeline.author: Brutus5000

replies.bodyText: ok so I need an I18N key for all of them? ok
replies.author: 1-alex98

timeline.bodyText: I am pretty sure game.reasonNotValid.keyFormat should not be in I18N, imagine somebody thinks he most translate it then this breaks for the other languages.
timeline.author: 1-alex98

replies.bodyText: Hmm yeah good point will just change it back to string formatting unless you think there is a better way
replies.author: Sheikah45

timeline.bodyText: Also you got to have a fallback. Maybe somebody adds a new validity reason to the server one day. I suggest if the i18n key does not exist just take the getValidity().name() and say it is the reason.
timeline.author: 1-alex98

replies.bodyText: On the other hand then parsing the json would not work so maybe that is not needed. But safety messure would not hurt...
replies.author: 1-alex98

timeline.author: 1-alex98

timeline.message:
Show reason for not rated games

Fixes #1864
Add check for key in i18n and remove formatkey from i18n

Change string to private

Co-authored-by: Alexander von Trostorff <19996713+axel1200@users.noreply.github.com>
